title: RIMSports Ventilated Weight Lifting Gloves with Wrist Support, Full Palm Protection Workout Gloves with Extra Grip, Great for Pull Ups, Cross Training, Fitness, WODs & Weightlifting for Men & Women
features: Wrist Support: The cross training gloves are designed with wrist wrap that protects your wrist from workout strain and will help take the pressure off your hands and give you a better chance at doing more reps

Ventilated Design: The open hand design of the training gloves allows you to feel less sweat while providing a comfortable workout experience; The ventilation helps keep your hands cool during intense workouts

Velcro Closure: Unlike other lifting gloves that are often too tight, and can be difficult to put on perfectly; The adjustable velcro strap in our gym gloves makes it more convenient to adjust the wrist wrap according to your size for a custom fit

Customer Guarantee: We have taken great care to do the best for our customers; RIMSports believe in quality, stand behind its promise, and are given durable workout glove; If you have any issues or questions, message us and we will take care of you

Hand Protection: The Wodies gloves provide a firm grip and protect your hands from injuries ; These lightweight, breathable fabric keep you feeling comfortable while giving support in all the right places, so it's easier to stay focused on workout

Palm Padded: With weightlifting gloves for women and men, you can work out without worrying about any muscle strain or rashes; The palms and fingers of these wrist wrap gloves are constructed with ideal padding for a comfortable experience

Premium Material: The bar workout gloves are made of premium neoprene, heavy duty velcro and silicone grips that wonâ€™t cause any irritation and are skin friendly; These calisthenics gloves are machine washable with mild detergent

Functional Design: The weight lifting barehand gloves is designed with a full palm, finger, and thumb protection that guarantees pain free workouts and will help you get through your workout without ever feeling discomfort
description: ABOUT US: We at RIMSports keenly focus on three factors; QUALITY, DESIGN, and COLOR to produce amazing unique products to stand up to your toughest workouts. We look for ways to make our products intuitive and better able to meet your needs LIFT SMARTER, GAIN BETTER! Lifting weights is an awesome way to build muscle, but if you're not concentrating on your hands then they'll get tired faster. That's where these gloves come in. They provide grip strength and stability with complete palm protection so that even when things get sweaty or dirty outside of the gym environment like at home during renovations you can still perform all aspects comfortably without worrying about hurting yourself  BENEFITS OF CROSS TRAINING PULL UP GLOVES  1. Improve grip strength and the intensity of the training session 2. Take the pressure off from the hands while lifting heavyweights 3. Avoid slipping of weights due to sweaty palms 4. Provide a comfortable workout experience 5. Help prevent injuries like blisters and calluses 6. Can significantly improve performance 7. Minimize the friction between the skin and the weights. Makes lifts smoother and easier  WHY CHOOSE RIMSports?  1. Made using top-grade quality premium materials. 2. Non slip contact padding to give a firmer hold. 3. Breathable fabric, so free from calluses and blisters 4. Portable and compact for easy transport and access 5. Open hand design for less sweat and comfort 6.Ideal for both men and women 7. Premium padded in the palm, fingers, and thumb for protection 8. Wrist strap for wrist support 9. Silicone grip increases your grip strength   Suitable Workouts 1. Deadlifts 2. Power Clean 3. Ring Dip 4. Pull Ups 5. Chin ups 6. Calisthenics 7. Gymnastics 8. Cross Workouts 9. WOD 10. Weight Lifting 11. Kettlebell Swing 12. Cycling 13. Rowing
